sentences.en: A has the additive property.
sentences.cn: A具有可加性.

sentences.en: Additive variance was higher than dominance variance, which indicates quantitative inheritance.
sentences.cn: 加性的变异高于显性的变异, 表明是数量遗传.

sentences.en: As mentioned above, it was a very iterative process where all of the element were slowly built up together through additive and subtraction means.
sentences.cn: 正如以上所提到的，将不同的元素通过加法和减法的方式，慢慢地组合到一起是一个需要不断反复的过程。

sentences.en: As you build these kinds of simulations, or anything like this, you need to think through whether things should be multiplicative or additive.
sentences.cn: 正如你建立各种仿真程序，或者类似的仿真程序时，你应该去想一想,他们应该是用加法还是用乘法。

sentences.en: Colour is often an additive in foods.
sentences.cn: 颜料经常是各种食物中的添加物.

sentences.en: Complementary to the three additive light primaries, there are three subtractive primaries.
sentences.cn: 与加色法三原色互为补色的颜色为减色法三原色.

sentences.en: Introducing the uniquely Boolean concept of complementation into an additive identity, we find an interesting effect.
sentences.cn: 介绍了独特的逻辑概念的互补成添加剂的特性，我们发现一个有趣的结果。

sentences.en: Nitrite is used as a food additive.
sentences.cn: 亚硝酸盐被用作一种食物的附加剂.

sentences.en: One of these was laced with a bitter additive that could be detected only on contact .
sentences.cn: 其中一种含有一些只有接触才能发现的苦味的添加剂。

sentences.en: Only the additive genetic variance is transmissible by seed.
sentences.cn: 仅仅加性遗传方差是由种子遗传的.

sentences.en: Our products are free from artificial additives .
sentences.cn: 我们的产品不含人工添加剂。

sentences.en: permitted food additives
sentences.cn: 允许使用的食品添加剂

sentences.en: Radiation effects relevant to this formalism are additive.
sentences.cn: 和这套公式有关的辐射效应是可以相加的.

sentences.en: Some food additive are regarded as beneficial by the manufacturer.
sentences.cn: 有些食品添加物,生产者认为是有用的.

sentences.en: The after effect occurs only if the additive is present during irradiation.
sentences.cn: 在辐照过程中只有当添加剂存在时才出现后效应.

sentences.en: The distances are additive along the length of the chromosome.
sentences.cn: 其距离值就是沿着染色体长度方向的累加.

sentences.en: This food is guaranteed additive - free , ie The manufacturer officially promises that it contains no additives.
sentences.cn: 该食品保证不含添加剂.

sentences.en: We call - a the additive inverse of a.
sentences.cn: 我们称 -a 为a的加性逆元素.

sentences.en: We call O the additive identity.
sentences.cn: 我们称O为加性单位元素.

sentences.en: We can use the additive property of the integral.
sentences.cn: 我们可利用积分的可加性.

sentences.en: We therefore write the formal mechanism in equations ( 47 a ), ( 47 b ) and ( 47 c ) in which ds is a donor additive.
sentences.cn: 因此,我们把正式的反应历程定成方程式 ( 47a ), ( 47b ) 和 ( 47c ),式中ds是 给电子添加剂.

sentences.en: When these dots are projected onto the total resources columns (top of figure), the results are additive.
sentences.cn: 当这些点映射到总资源列（图的顶部）上时，结果是附加的。

words.tran_cn: 蝰蛇（欧洲产的小毒蛇）；加算器；猪鼻蛇（北美产无毒的）
添加；[数] 加法；增加物
增加，添加；补充说；计算…总和

trans.tran_en: a substance that is added to food to improve its taste, appearance etc
